sentences.english: Kongjwi lived with her wicked stepmother and stepsister Patjwi.
sentences.korean: 콩쥐는 못된 계모와 의붓자매 팥쥐와 함께 살았습니다.

sentences.english: They made her do hard work while Patjwi played all day.
sentences.korean: 팥쥐가 하루 종일 노는 동안 그들은 그녀에게 힘든 일을 시켰습니다.

sentences.english: A cow and a toad helped Kongjwi with her impossible tasks.
sentences.korean: 소와 두꺼비가 콩쥐의 불가능한 일을 도와주었습니다.

sentences.english: She went to the village festival but lost her shoe on the way.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 마을 축제에 갔지만 도중에 신발을 잃어버렸습니다.

sentences.english: The magistrate found the shoe and looked for its owner.
Kongjwi married the magistrate and Patjwi was punished for her jealousy.
sentences.korean: 콩쥐는 원님과 결혼했고 팥쥐는 질투심 때문에 벌을 받았습니다.

sentences.english: Kongjwi forgave them and lived happily ever after.
sentences.korean: 콩쥐는 그들을 용서하고 오래오래 행복하게 살았습니다.
